Text: I'm guessing this is the same speech available on youtube? It would be nice to have a hard copy to give to friends, but Im looking for the same basic information, minus the cell phone video and audio quality. One could use a variety of programs to just save the video from YouTube, instead of waiting for seeders here.
Directly from his website, it a variety of languages. Also available, all the resources he mentions in his lecture, and much more. Good stuff. http://www.adaptt.org/videos.html
